1: <mistake>mdzos</mistake> pa'i gzugs bya'o//gang gis <mistake>te</mistake> <mistake>skd</mistake> byed <mistake>gyurn//de</mistake> la lag pa bstan par bya//zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so//de nas ji ltar mkha' 'gro ma rnams <mistake>kya</mistake>
2: mtshan <mistake>myin</mistake> <mistake>zhena/nang</mistake> pa'i mig gi 'bras 'dra <mistake>ba// dphal</mistake> bar <mistake>ti</mistake> <mistake>shul</mistake> te mdung thung //phyin log mig dang <mistake>khrogner</mistake> <mistake>can //nu</mistake> ma dag ni mi sdug pa//sna ni rnam pa gnyis yin te//gtsug <mistake>gs</mistake>
3: bskor ba shes byas te//ri mo gsum <mistake>kyis</mistake> yongs su <mistake>bskor // de</mistake> yi khyim gyi mtshan ma <mistake>ni//ri</mistake> <mistake>shAul</mistake> tshung nge me long <mistake>dang//ral</mistake> <mistake>gi</mistake> tshul dang rgyal mtshan dang //rtse gcig khyim gyi mtshan mar <mistake>bsan//</mistake>
4: 'gro bar gyur na mkha' 'gro ma//'di 'dra'i mtshan ma bstan par bya//glo bur mi dga' bya ba <mistake>dang//don</mistake> med par yang 'jug pa'o//rkang pa la yang ral gri <mistake>'gyur//i</mistake> <mistake>shul</mistake> <mistake>la dang</mistake> 'dra ba'i <mistake>tsul/</mistake>
5: skad dang bya rog 'dra ba yi//de ni rtag par 'gyur <mistake>ba'o //mtshan</mistake> <mistake>did</mistake> de dag dang ldan <mistake>pa//dm</mistake> pa'i mkha' 'gro <mistake>mzhes</mistake> bya//zhes <mistake>bgcom</mistake> <mistake>lgan</mistake> <mistake>das</mistake> dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs <mistake>so///</mistake>
6: de la ji ltar thams cad 'gugs pa'i <mistake>rgya</mistake> yin zhe <mistake>na/tog</mistake> pa thams <mistake>cadgsang</mistake> <mistake>chan</mistake> po//rdo rje lcags kyu dril bcas pas//bkug nas de nas bya ba nas//dril <mistake>ba</mistake> rjes su <mistake>dkol</mistake> ba'o//de la <mistake>dji</mistake>
7: ltar mchod pa <mistake>chan</mistake> po thams <mistake>cadkyi</mistake> <mistake>chog</mistake> yin zhe na/rtog pa thams cad gsang chen gyi//gang gis dga' nas mchod pa ni//rjes su mchod pa dang gzhan <mistake>yang//dbyangs</mistake> dang sil <mistake>snan</mistake> gar gyi
8: <mistake>yen//de</mistake> la ji ltar rang gis rig pa'i lha thams cad bsgrub pa chen po'i <mistake>rgy</mistake> yin zhe <mistake>na/ rtog</mistake> pa kun las bsgrub bya <mistake>kun/g.yo</mistake> dang mi g.yo 'gyur ba ste//rang gi yi dam <mistake>la</mistake> sbyor nas//thams
